akn:section.akn:heading: Period covered by returns or other documents

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 6101. Period covered by returns or other documents When not otherwise provided for by this title, the Secretary may by regulations prescribe the period for which, or the date as of which, any return, statement, or other document required by this title or by regulations, shall be made. (Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 753; Pub. L. 94–455, title XIX, § 1906(b)(13)(A), Oct. 4, 1976, 90 Stat. 1834.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1976—Pub. L. 94–455 struck out “or his delegate” after “Secretary”.
